name: Mary P. SMITH, individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Frank Smith, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Walter Baran, in his official capacity as Secretary of General Services; the Department of General Services, et al

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Mary P. SMITH, individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Frank Smith, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Walter Baran, in his official capacity as Secretary of General Services; the Department of General Services, et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John D. Blumenthal, Doylestown, for appellant.
James J. Kutz, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
501 A.2d 247
Mary P. SMITH, individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Frank Smith, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Walter Baran, in his official capacity as Secretary of General Services; the Department of General Services, et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 2, 1985.
Decided Dec. 10, 1985.
John D. Blumenthal, Doylestown, for appellant.
James J. Kutz, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
